patches.name: Witness of First Light
patches.description: The moment God opened your eyes ‚Äî when Christ, the Light of the world, pierced the veil. Not your discovery, but His revelation. A holy beginning.
patches.scripture_text: That was the true Light which gives light to every man coming into the world. He was in the world, and the world was made through Him, and the world did not know Him.
patches.realm_of_meaning: The sacred moment when the Light of Christ breaks through the blindness of the world and pierces the soul. A divine act of mercy ‚Äî when God opens spiritual eyes to behold the truth.

patches.name: Witness Ember
patches.description: The Everburning Testimony ‚Äî for those who burn inwardly with the fire of the Spirit, even when unseen by the world.
patches.scripture_text: Therefore I remind you to stir up the gift of God which is in you... For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.
patches.motto: Still I Burn. Still I Believe.
patches.realm_of_meaning: The hidden ones who burn inwardly with the fire of the Spirit. The flame passed down through whispers, scars, scripture, and sacred unseen acts of obedience.
